name: Fare
description:
Very basic demo of Fare aesthetics, map and movement systems. Best experienced in full-screen mode.

Keybinds:

W - speed up
X - slow down
D - turn right
A - turn left
S - reset to current heading/speed

P - dock/undock (must be within 2 tiles)
V - radio beacon map

Space - execute movement

Escape - quit game
0 (zero) - reset game

Hover cursor over city to see the name.
